mapper.sql: t.*, c.vehicle_number vehicle_number, o.name oildepot_name, g.name gasstation_name, fn_type2name('transportStatus', t.status) status_name
mapper.select:
select
from tbl_transport t,tbl_vehicle c,tbl_oildepot o,tbl_gasstation g where t.vehicle_id=c.id and t.oildepot_id=o.id and t.gasstation_id=g.id
select from tbl_transport t,tbl_vehicle c,tbl_oildepot o,tbl_gasstation g where t.vehicle_id=c.id and t.oildepot_id=o.id and t.gasstation_id=g.id and t.id=#{id}
select id from tbl_transport where distribute_id=#{invoice} ORDER BY issue_time DESC LIMIT 1
select id, oildepot_id, gasstation_id from tbl_transport where distribute_id=#{invoice} ORDER BY issue_time DESC LIMIT 1
select id, status from tbl_transport where vehicle_id=#{carId} ORDER BY issue_time DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_transport(distribute_id,vehicle_id,store_id,oildepot_id,gasstation_id,status,trigger_type,trigger_id) values( #{distributNO}, #{carId}, #{binNum}, (select o.id from tbl_oildepot o where o.official_id=#{depotNo}), (select g.id from tbl_gasstation g where g.official_id=#{deptId}), 1,0,0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_transport where distribute_id = #{invoice}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_transport t1 SET t1.status = 4, t1.end_time = NOW() WHERE t1.id in (SELECT t3.id FROM (SELECT t2.id id FROM tbl_transport t2 WHERE t2.vehicle_id = #{carId} AND t2.store_id = #{storeId} AND t2.status < 2 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,t2.issue_time,NOW()) > 30) t3)
mapper.sql: t.id transport_id, t.distribute_id, t.vehicle_id, c.vehicle_number, t.store_id, t.oildepot_id, IF(ISNULL(o.short_name) || LENGTH(TRIM(o.short_name)) < 1, o.`name`, o.short_name) oildepot_name, t.gasstation_id, IF(ISNULL(g.short_name) || LENGTH(TRIM(g.short_name)) < 1, g.`name`, g.short_name) gasstation_name, t.`status`, DATE_FORMAT( t.issue_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%I:%S' ) issue_time
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tbl_transport t, tbl_vehicle c, tbl_oildepot o, tbl_gasstation g WHERE t.vehicle_id = c.id AND t.oildepot_id = o.id AND t.gasstation_id = g.id AND t.`status` = 1 AND t.gasstation_id = #{gasStationId}
